Name Rascal/Libraries/Vis/Figure/Properties/center

Function FProperty center()
Description center defines horizontal and vertical centered alignment. It sets the horzontal and vertical anchor to 50% of the width, respectively, the height of the current figure. center() is equivalent to anchor(0.5, 0.5).

Also see BoxModel and anchor.
